=Configuration Options Reference=

Options are specified in the configuration file using
`$config[$name] = $value;`

The following options are reserved for the Application core.  You may
also add arbitrary options for your app.

{{{
	// In default.inc.php:
	$config['myoption'] = 'something';
}}}

Options are are accessible via `$app->config['myoption'];`

===Database Access===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *db_host* || True || `localhost` || The database server hostname or IP ||
|| *db_user* || True || || The database username ||
|| *db_pass* || True || || The database password ||
|| *db_name* || True || || The database name to use ||

===Application Core===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *base_url* || False || Determined from appRoot and $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] || The web application root directory ||
|| *admin_path* || False || || The relative path of the admin site (omit if the admin site is served from its own domain) ||
|| *user_class* || False || User || The name of the model to use for user authentication and permission (must extend [http://home.jongsma.org/software/phpapp/docs/phpdoc/phpapp-modules/BaseUser.html BaseUser]) ||
|| *login_url* || False || || The URL of the application's login page (needed by Application::requireLogin())
|| *debug* || False || `false` || The URL of the application's login page (needed by Application::requireLogin())

===Content Modules===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *modules* || False || || A list of modules to include, as a `name => module_directory` array ||
|| *models* || False || || A list of additional directories containing model definitions that are not part of a module ||

===Caching===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *cache_dir* || False || `/tmp/cache-APPID` || A temporary cache directory ||
|| *cache_files* || False || || A list of `filename => url` entries for preconfigured cacheing of remote files, retrievable via Application::getCacheFile($filename).

===Email Delivery===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *mail_host* || False || || The SMTP server to send mail through ||
|| *mail_user* || False || || The SMTP username to connect to the mail server as ||
|| *mail_pass* || False || || The SMTP user's password ||
|| *mail_from* || False || || The default "From" header for outbound emails ||
|| *mail_replyto* || False || || The default "Reply-To" header for outbound emails ||
|| *mail_templates* || False || || A directory containing preconfigured email templates ||
